name: Root of Yggdrasil
description:
This is (not) typical tower defence game made in Game Jam 2023 (Roots) by University West of England's students.

Plan and plants your tree to grow and expend your turf. Defend from the nasty animals who try to steal foods from the tree of life.

Global Game Jam Link:

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/not-your-typical-td-9
